articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Australia’s Macquarie Dictionary picks ‘enshittification’ as word of 2024 - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Judging committee says term captures widespread sense that things are getting worse.
articles.content:
Australias oldest dictionary of Australian English has chosen enshittification a slang term referring to the deterioration of products and services online as the word of 2024.
Macquarie Dictionary, … [+1811 chars]
